name: Space Trader for Windows
body:
## Information

### Space Trader for Windows

Space Trader for Windows is based closely on Space Trader for Palm, by Pieter Spronk. Much of the information on this site was taken from [Pieter's Space Trader site](http://ticc.uvt.nl/~pspronck/spacetrader/STFrames.html), with permission. Visit the Download page to download the game. The game requires the .NET framework 3.5, which is available [from Microsoft](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/vstudio/aa496123).

### News

* 2013-02-17 After a long period of inactivity at the old SourceForge site, Space Trader for Windows has a new home on GitHub!
* More news from the old site will be copied here soon.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
